results.content: Porque me ha enseñado nuevas cosas que yo no conocía. Y empecé  a ver lo útil que resulta emplear drush en mi sitio web de prueba. Aunque me queda claro que en mi caso lo debo de hacer de manera "local" al servidor web, para qu drush pueda trabajar.

results.content:
Instructor doesn't give a thorough explanation of how to setup drush and connect to your Drupal website. I was completely at sea and had to use a couple of external resources to figure it out before I could continue with the course.

The pace of the class was a bit slow as well and the instructor didn't have a proper sandbox to use for taking the class through examples (for example, he couldn't install modules because he didn't have an internet connection). 

I've been really happy with Udemy, but this class was an absolute waste of time and money.

Instructor doesn't give a thorough explanation of how to setup drush and connect to your Drupal website. I was completely at sea and had to use a couple of external resources to figure it out before I could continue with the course.

The pace of the class was a bit slow as well and the instructor didn't have a proper sandbox to use for taking the class through examples (for example, he couldn't install modules because he didn't have an internet connection).

I've been really happy with Udemy, but this class was an absolute waste of time and money.
